about_the_game:
"Parallel Plague: Good Old Days" emerges as the undisputed star of the 2024 Steam FPS Festival, setting a new standard for gaming excellence. This revolutionary title defies conventional boundaries by seamlessly merging the fast-paced intensity of a first-person shooter (FPS) with the strategic depth of a third-person shooter (TPS).

In this immersive gaming experience, players traverse parallel worlds, confronting a relentless onslaught of zombies that challenges both their reflexes and tactical acumen. The dual perspective adds a layer of complexity, offering a unique blend of heart-pounding action and methodical precision.

What sets "Parallel Plague" apart is its commitment to delivering an unparalleled gaming adventure. The festival will witness the convergence of two distinct genres, creating an innovative gameplay experience that captivates players from all walks of gaming. The narrative unfolds against the backdrop of an apocalyptic world where the undead roam freely, creating an atmosphere of tension and suspense.

Prepare to be enthralled by the meticulously crafted environments, each telling a story of its own, from dilapidated urban landscapes to mysterious otherworldly realms. The graphical prowess of "Parallel Plague" showcases cutting-edge design and visual effects, promising a feast for the eyes and an immersive escape into a dystopian reality.

As players navigate through the festival, they will discover an arsenal of weapons and gadgets strategically placed to aid in their survival. The game's intricate level design and dynamic gameplay mechanics ensure that each encounter feels fresh and exhilarating.

"Parallel Plague: Good Old Days" invites gamers to break free from the conventional and embrace a fusion of genres that pushes the boundaries of what is possible in the world of gaming. This festival promises an unforgettable journey into the heart of innovation, where adrenaline-pumping action meets tactical brilliance. Brace yourself for a gaming revolution – "Parallel Plague" is here to redefine your perception of what a truly exceptional game can achieve.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not appropriate for all ages or may be inappropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-4340 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1650 or AMD Radeon™ HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 84 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit latest update
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ R5 1600X Processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1660 or AMD Radeon™ R9 390 / AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 84 GB available space

short_description: "Parallel Plague: Good Old Days" redefines gaming excellence as a standout entry at the 2024 Steam FPS Festival. Experience the hybrid FPS and TPS gameplay in a post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies, offering a unique blend of action and strategy for an extraordinary adventure.
